1.content: to start off you need to choose your a slot for team and their story
1.title: let's begin

11.content:
do these characters sound cool to you

Oscar Pines

Whitley Schnee

Penny Polendina

Ilia Amitola

Neo Politan
11.title: slot 1

114.content: when does this story start
114.title: all 5

1141.content:
when Oscar landed in mantle the first thing Ozpin told him was to find a team little did he know someone was fallowing him

Oscar: Ozpin where am I going find a team

Ozpin: life works in mysterious ways you'll find a team Oscar

an ursa appears as if from nowhere and lunges at Oscar with its claws Oscar blocks the strike with his cane Oscar and the ursa grapple until ___ comes to Oscar's rescue
1141.title: before they became a team

11411.content:
Ilia (who had been watching the whole time) chokes the ursa with her whip whilst Oscar stabs the ursa with his cane and the ursa dissolves

Oscar: thank you

Ilia: no problem I'll be on my way now

Oscar: wait we could team up we're more powerful together

Ilia: maybe you are

Oscar: what would Blake do

Ilia: good point let's go

meanwhile with ___
11411.title: ilia

114111.content:
Jacques Schnee had not been in prison for long and Whitley had already felt something he had never felt before FREEEDOM

Willow and Klein enter the room

Willow: take this

Willow hands Whitley a rapier/dust revolver for him to use as a weapon

Whitley: why would I need this

Klein: huntsman training

Whitley: I'm not a huntsman

Willow: that's why we're training you how to become one

Whitley: why would I do that

Willow: you need to learn how to fight

Whitley: I am not fighting

Willow: then you're not inheriting the SDC

Whitley: it's beneath me

Klein: you're becoming a huntsman and that's final

Willow and Klein train Whitley how to fight and use his semblance which he masters surprisingly fast Whitley then travels throughout mantle and sees a truck full of SDC slaves being sent to the dust mines all of them are faunus Whitley stops the truck and sets the faunus free

Whitley: GO RUN HIDE

the faunus leave and Whitley continues walking when he hears a fight going on nearby
114111.title: Whitley

1141111.content:
Oscar and Ilia are fighting a hoarde of sabyrs and struggling to kill them Oscar is almost out of aura and Ilia has dropped her weapon when out of no where a megoliath kills the sabyrs instantly

but the megoliath wasn't a grimm at all it was a summoned grimm from a schnee

Whitley: you're welcome

Oscar and Ilia turn towards the sound and see Whitley Schnee had saved them

Oscar: thanks for that you should join us

Ilia: Oscar are you crazy I am not teaming up with a schnee

Oscar: what would Blake do

Ilia: that's different she didn't have a choice

Whitley: I know about the dust mine explosion I just want to make the wrongs my father has done right

Ilia: fine you can join us

Whitley: thank you
1141111.title: back to oscar and ilia

11411111.content:
Neo begins to question weather or not she should continue working for Cinder

Neo swipes the relic and uses her semblance to escape

once Neo gets far enough away from Cinder Neo goes to mantle at which point she ___
11411111.title: meanwhile with neo

114111111.content:
Oscar is about to attack Neo but stops as he sees her giving him the relic back

Oscar is confused

Oscar: uh thanks

Ozpin takes over

Ozpin: Neo I know really happened to Roman

Ozpin uses his magic to show Neo the truth

Neo is upset at first but begrudgingly joins the team at which point
114111111.title: encounters the trio

info.brief_description: invent your own rwby cc team and write their story
info.description:
invent your own rwby team

have them go on adventures of your choice

canon characters only

NO OC's

cc ships are allowed of every type (male/female) (male/male) (female/female) (human/human) (faunus/faunus) (human/faunus) (polyamory)

death is allowed

have fun get creative
